name: Espresso
description: A strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Iced Latte
description: A creamy and refreshing coffee made with espresso, milk, and served over ice.

name: Cappuccino
description: A popular Italian coffee with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth and naturally sweet coffee made by steeping coarsely ground beans in cold water.

name: Flat White
description: A silky coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, without the foam of a cappuccino.

name: Americano
description: A diluted espresso drink that combines a shot of espresso with hot water.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

name: Affogato
description: A decadent coffee dessert where hot espresso is poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso drink with a small amount of foamed milk on top.

name: Iced Mocha
description: A refreshing mix of espresso, chocolate, and milk served over ice.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional Middle Eastern coffee prepared with finely ground coffee beans and brewed in a cezve.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
description: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen for a creamy texture and smooth taste.
